name: Godot Craft
description:
Hello!

This project was the result of a challenge to make a Minecraft-ish clone in a day. I used the Godot game engine and made the assets by hand. It's mostly just a proof of concept, but not bad for 24 hours. 

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Rotate

Left Click - Destroy Block

Right Click - Place Block

Scroll Wheel - Select Block from inventory

Playing Locally:

Playing GodotCraft in a web browser often isn't the best experience. To play locally, download GodotCraft.pck for the source and open it with Godot 3.2.x.
